summary.body: We were amazed and thrilled last night at around 9:30 to see a fox slinking along the podium under Speed House. We followed him along the podium, up the stairs to the conservatory where he (or she) pattered off towards the Golden Lane Estate. Even though it was a bit of a scrawny specimen, it still struck us as rather grand to be living amongst wild mammals in the heart of the city. Or are there any horrendous down-sides to sharing our homes with  ?
summary.subject: Fox on the podium

summary.body: about 3pm on Friday - lots of rumblings; sounds like buildings being demolished nearby. anyone know what all the noise is?
summary.subject: what is all that noise?

summary.body: Hello Neighbours, I live on Golden Lane Estate, and I'm tring to rally up support for objecting to the late license that the Shakepeare pub (on Aldersgate Street) have applied for. Does the noise  reach as far as the Barbican, John Trundle Court perhaps?
summary.subject: Shakespeare pub late license

summary.body: Has anyone else noticed a grinding squealing noise at night ?  Any ideas where it is coming from ?
summary.subject: Squealing noise near speed house
